biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Daniel St. Pierre (aka Dan St. Pierre) is an American film director, art director, production designer, actor, animation artist, and musician. For his work in bring the Deep Canvas technique to the film Tarzan (1999), he received a 1999 Annie Award nomination for "Outstanding Individual Achievement for Production Design in an Animated Feature Production".
